title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, when I select SWT.MULTI in the Text tab, the ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons in the ControlExample also triggers the beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not emit a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI, and clicking on other buttons should not cause the beep sound either.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K
2. Launch the SWT example ControlExample
3. Go to the Text tab
4. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE
5. Click back on Styles SWT.MULTI
